ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Marvyn Koenigsberg ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. MARVYN KOENIGSBERG, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective March 26, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
